Title: A Wall Street Thanksgiving
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Lauren Bans, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Uncle Marvin returns with a proposition for the family, while Beverly's plans for Thanksgiving dinner goes awry.
